name: FormShift (Demo)
description:
This is my first game prototype to see if I can make a game and if people are interested in the concept in order for me to finish it.

This idea started as a mobile game and I will attempt to publish it on the google play store too

WASD / Arrow keys - to move

Mouse - navigate menus

J - Offensive Ability (character specific) - Hold for charged version

K - Defensive Ability (character specific)  - Hold for charged version
